product_name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Vest - Men's
long_description: Soft, warm and durable, the men's Patagonia Better Sweater vest handles a blustery afternoon at the crags-or an early morning meeting-with dignity and style. Made from polyester fleece, it dries quickly and adds torso warmth on its own for the shoulder seasons or layers nicely under a shell deep into winter. The resilient knit face resembles wool and the plush fleece interior feels broken-in. Front zipper has a garage and windflap to fight chilly gusts. Contrasting trim detail at wind flap, pockets, armholes and hem lend nice finish details. Better Sweater vest features zip handwarmer and chest pockets. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
short_description: Soft, warm and durable, the men's Patagonia Better Sweater vest handles a blustery afternoon at the crags-or an early morning meeting-with dignity and style.
